sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ExternalTriggersHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ExternalTriggersHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ExternalTriggersHelper = Class.create();
ExternalTriggersHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    updateSampleOutputJSON: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ih_external_trigger_definition');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', this.getParameter('sysparm_trigger_definition_id'));
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.sample_output_json = this.getParameter('sysparm_sample_body');
            if (gr.update())
                return true;
        }
        gs.error('Error updating sample output to trigger: ' + this.getParameter('sysparm_trigger_definition_id'));

        return false;
    },

    type: 'ExternalTriggersHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-08 07:50:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9b7065bfeb051110fa13d90b23522866</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ExternalTriggersHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow IntegrationHub External Trigger" source="com.glide.ih.external_trigger">497b5ebb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4321</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9b7065bfeb051110fa13d90b23522866</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-08 07:50:40</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
